channel.title: FoxscapePRO - Bringin Back Old School RSPS
channel.description:
[u][size=18pt][b]FoxscapePRO[/b][/size][/u] by Fox2007
[url=http://foxscapepro.com/index.php?pageid=webclient]Webclient - Play Now![/url] [url=https://dl.dropbox.com/u/103983828/Client%20v2.5.zip]Download .Jar Client[/url]
[u]Dont want to use this client? Server IP and Port Below![/u] Server IP: profox.no-ip.biz Port: 43594
During cache download, the client will be white. This is normal. You will also get a run error. Just refresh the page and its fixed.Also, the client has been jarred for quick loading. Full client will be released later.
[b]This is a new source that I am currently working with. So far everything is working great. I have admins and mods already, so please dont spam me with questions regarding this. Second, this is indeed PI based, but this will look nothing like or play like PI. I am trying my best to make it not even close to PI. I started from a scrapped PI source. (meaning almost all BS was removed).[/b]
So far progress has been okay. Features are below:
[ul][li]No custom Items/Objects/NPC[/li] [li]Beginner training / Main home at Varrock[/li] [li]Training fairly easy[/li] [li]Skilling based economy[/li] [li]PvP in Wilderness / other places[/li] [li]Trading[/li] [li]All shops are NPC based around varrock[/li] [li]Fair prices on all items. Not easily affordable.[/li] [li]Overall server is challenging. KBD kicked my ass.[/li] [li]Minigames[/li] [li]Bosses[/li] [li]Moved original PI teleports to commands[/li] [li]Teleports now teleport you to correct areas[/li] [li]NPC Clipping[/li] [li]Player following with Clipping.[/li][/ul]
[img]http://foxscapepro.com/images/1.PNG[/img] [img]http://foxscapepro.com/images/2.PNG[/img] [img]http://foxscapepro.com/images/3.PNG[/img] [img]http://foxscapepro.com/images/4.PNG[/img] [img]http://foxscapepro.com/images/5.PNG[/img] [img]http://foxscapepro.com/images/6.PNG[/img] [img]http://foxscapepro.com/images/7.PNG[/img] [img]http://foxscapepro.com/images/8.PNG[/img] [img]http://foxscapepro.com/images/9.PNG[/img] [img]http://foxscapepro.com/images/10.PNG[/img] [img]http://foxscapepro.com/images/11.PNG[/img] [img]http://foxscapepro.com/images/12.PNG[/img]

item.title: FoxscapePRO - Bringin Back Old School RSPS
item.dc:creator: @Fox2007 Fox2007
item.description:
@Fox2007 wrote:

[size=18pt]FoxscapePRO[/size]
by Fox2007

Webclient - Play Now!
Download .Jar Client

Dont want to use this client? Server IP and Port Below!
Server IP: profox.no-ip.biz
Port: 43594

During cache download, the client will be white. This is normal. You will also get a run error. Just refresh the page and its fixed.Also, the client has been jarred for quick loading. Full client will be released later.

This is a new source that I am currently working with. So far everything is working great. I have admins and mods already, so please dont spam me with questions regarding this. Second, this is indeed PI based, but this will look nothing like or play like PI. I am trying my best to make it not even close to PI. I started from a scrapped PI source. (meaning almost all BS was removed).

So far progress has been okay. Features are below:

[ul][li]No custom Items/Objects/NPC[/li]
[li]Beginner training / Main home at Varrock[/li]
[li]Training fairly easy[/li]
[li]Skilling based economy[/li]
[li]PvP in Wilderness / other places[/li]
[li]Trading[/li]
[li]All shops are NPC based around varrock[/li]
[li]Fair prices on all items. Not easily affordable.[/li]
[li]Overall server is challenging. KBD kicked my ass.[/li]
[li]Minigames[/li]
[li]Bosses[/li]
[li]Moved original PI teleports to commands[/li]
[li]Teleports now teleport you to correct areas[/li]
[li]NPC Clipping[/li]
[li]Player following with Clipping.[/li][/ul]












Read full topic
item.source: FoxscapePRO - Bringin Back Old School RSPS
